title: Investigation of flow behaviour in the nozzle of a Pelton wheel: Effects and analysis of influencing parameters
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Satish Geeri, Aditya Kolakoti, Olusegun David Samuel, Mohamed Abbas, Peter Alenoghena Aigba, Habeeb A. Ajimotokan, Christopher C. Enweremadu, Noureddine Elboughdiri, M.A. Mujtaba
